page.title: 14PASTIMES
page.content: I spend my spare time on a pony called Judy. I am going to try and make some small jumps for her. I exercise her as much as I can and clean out the paddock. A pony takes up a lot of time. My spare time is nearly always spent fishing for trout. I used to do course fishing in the canal. I would catch roach,pike or perch. I go to dancing lessons on a Tuesday night in the Garrell Vale centre. It starts with majorettes.Then tap dancing. Later we have disco dancing. We have a show. I have 12 medals and 6 certificates. Three times a week I go to gymnastics. They are held in the leisure centre. I have just learned to do the splits. I will be in a competition in October.
